info.title: Context Tester for Glucose Meter

glucose.tester.description: This Resource describes the Properties associated with context tester. The tester Property is a read-only value that is provided by the Server where especially hcp stands for HealthCare Professional.

tester.description: The possible cases of testers who may perform the blood sugar measurement.
